name: DupStat

screenshots.caption: Application shows file duplicate statistics with file-by-file comparisons below. Duplicates are highlighted in yellow.
Highlighting unique files in a backup directory
Searching for duplicates within a single folder (same directory on left and right sides)

short_description:
This tool helps find duplicate files and folders across two selected directories.  It can answer questions like, "What files are on my thumb drive that are not on my PC", and can help synchronize different backup copies of a folder structure.  It helps you merge backups without accidentally deleting unique files.

DupStat compares files across two selected directories (and their subdirectories).  It shows duplication statistics across the selected directories to help you see where entire directories are duplicated.

Version 0.5 has several new features, including Action menu with copy/move/delete capability, drag-and-drop capability to specify search directories on either side, file counts in the file pane, tooltips for most UI controls and options, directory swap and copy buttons, cleaned up UI options, Several updates and refinements are also included; see the change history section of the Readme file.
summary: Duplicate/unique file analyzer with at-a-glance statistics.
